Brake Values

Information
RetarderLevel

<0;max> where 0 is disabled retarder and max is maximal value found in Truck configuration See Also: Constants.Motor.RetarderStepCount <summary> Current level of the retarder </summary> <!----> **INFORMATION** <!----> 0;max where 0 is disabled retarder and max is maximal value found in TRUCK configuration <!----> **INFORMATION** <!----> <seealso cref="Constants.Motor.RetarderStepCount" />.
